statements: SELECT * FROM IoT_Device_Security
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM IoT_Device_Security WHERE security_level = 'High'
SELECT device_id, device_name, security_level FROM IoT_Device_Security ORDER BY device_name ASC
SELECT device_name, privacy_status FROM IoT_Device_Security WHERE security_level IN ('High', 'Medium')
SELECT * FROM IoT_Device_Security WHERE privacy_status = 'Public'
SELECT * FROM IoT_Device_Security ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT device_name, privacy_status FROM IoT_Device_Security WHERE security_level='High';
SELECT device_name, security_level, privacy_status FROM IoT_Device_Security WHERE device_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM IoT_Device_Security WHERE security_level='Low' AND privacy_status='Public';
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM IoT_Device_Security ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM IoT_Device;
SELECT device_name, security_score FROM IoT_Device WHERE security_score > 75;
SELECT device_type FROM IoT_Device ORDER BY device_type ASC;
SELECT device_name, privacy_score FROM IoT_Device WHERE privacy_score < 50 ORDER BY privacy_score DESC;
SELECT device_id, last_check FROM IoT_Device WHERE device_type = 'Sensor' AND last_check > '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM IoT_Device WHERE security_score > 80
SELECT device_name, privacy_score, last_check FROM IoT_Device ORDER BY last_check DESC
SELECT device_id, device_name, privacy_score, security_score FROM IoT_Device WHERE privacy_score > 70 AND security_score < 90
SELECT device_id, device_name, compliance_score FROM IoT_Device JOIN Compliance_Status ON IoT_Device.device_id = Compliance_Status.device_id
SELECT * FROM Compliance_Status WHERE compliance_score = 100 ORDER BY compliance_date ASC
SELECT * FROM iot_devices;
SELECT device_name, security_status FROM iot_devices;
SELECT device_name, security_status FROM iot_devices WHERE security_status='active';
SELECT d.device_name, l.location_name FROM iot_devices d JOIN iot_locations l ON d.location_id = l.location_id;

SELECT o.organization_name, COUNT(*) AS device_count FROM iot_devices d JOIN iot_locations l ON d.location_id = l.location_id JOIN organizations o ON l.organization_id = o.organization_id GROUP BY o.organization_name;
SELECT * FROM iot_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name, location_id, security_status FROM iot_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;

SELECT iot_devices.device_id, iot_devices.device_name, iot_locations.location_name, organizations.organization_name FROM iot_devices LEFT JOIN iot_locations ON iot_devices.location_id = iot_locations.location_id LEFT JOIN organizations ON iot_locations.organization_id = organizations.organization_id;
SELECT * FROM iot_devices WHERE security_status = 'Secure';

SELECT iot_devices.device_name, organizations.organization_name FROM iot_devices INNER JOIN iot_locations ON iot_devices.location_id = iot_locations.location_id INNER JOIN organizations ON iot_locations.organization_id = organizations.organization_id ORDER BY organizations.industry_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM IoT_Devices;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer, location FROM IoT_Devices;
SELECT device_name, firmware_version FROM IoT_Devices WHERE firmware_version = '1.5';
SELECT device_id, last_check_in FROM IoT_Devices ORDER BY last_check_in DESC;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer, location FROM IoT_Devices WHERE manufacturer = 'XYZ Inc.';
SELECT device_name, manufacturer, location FROM IoT_Devices;
SELECT * FROM Device_Security WHERE encryption_enabled = true;

SELECT d.device_name, s.encryption_enabled, p.data_encryption, c.compliance_date FROM IoT_Devices d JOIN Device_Security s ON d.device_id = s.device_id JOIN Device_Privacy p ON d.device_id = p.device_id JOIN Compliance_Status c ON d.device_id = c.device_id;
SELECT device_id, firewall_enabled FROM Device_Security WHERE antivirus_installed = false;
SELECT d.device_name, s.encryption_enabled FROM IoT_Devices d LEFT JOIN Device_Security s ON d.device_id = s.device_id WHERE manufacturer = 'Google';
SELECT * FROM devices;
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT device_id, device_name, status FROM devices WHERE device_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM device_data WHERE data_type = 'temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT issue_id, issue_type, issue_description FROM privacy_issues WHERE resolution_status = 'pending';
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices WHERE status='active';
SELECT * FROM device_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY data_type ASC;
SELECT event_type, event_description FROM security_events ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT issue_type, issue_description, resolution_status FROM privacy_issues WHERE resolution_status='pending' ORDER BY issue_id;
SELECT device_name, location, audit_result FROM devices JOIN compliance_audit ON devices.device_id = compliance_audit.device_id WHERE audit_date <= '2022-06-30';
